body:
Let's say I'm playing on an alt to not get targeted or to not get noticed, and I get false banned for hacking, and I log in with my main account, will it count as ban evading? All of you know I don't hack, so I'm assuming it won't? I'm still not sure.

Do I need to appeal first?

This didn't happen to me, I'm just getting an alt soon and need some advice.

title: Question

replies.body: No, you shouldn't have to worry about anything because if you can proove you weren't hacking your alt will be un banned and you won't be banned for ban evading but you should let a staff member know just incase
replies.body_tagged: No, you shouldn't have to worry about anything because if you can proove you weren't hacking your alt will be un banned and you won't be banned for ban evading but you should let a staff member know just incase

replies.body: Yes, you need to appeal first. If you evade any active ban, you will be punished regardless of whether or not it's false.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, you need to appeal first. If you evade any active ban, you will be punished regardless of whether or not it's false.

replies.body:
You should appeal first.

If it's a false ban then you should be easily able to appeal it.
If you evade it, it will only make things harder for you in the long run.
